56662.<voice 00060_00056662><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00060_00056662><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Oh, this is!<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56663.<voice 00300_00056663><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00300_00056663><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Yum. It's delicious! The freshly made

56664.<voice 00330_00056664><start_lip_sync n0:
With this, even dishes that are several years old will taste just as good as when they were freshly
prepared.

56665.<voice 00430_00056665><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00430_00056665><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>What a Hollow. It's pathetic that he

unless he's cornered.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56666.<voice 00460_00056666><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00460_00056666><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>I'm sure they rushed to <pc>

56667.<voice 00540_00056667><start_lip_sync n0:

cooks all over the world will be joyful.

56668.<voice 00660_00056668><start_lip_sync n0:
Hmmm? You look as if you are trying to say, ''I didn't realize that the research related to Hollow's mission

56669.<voice 00690_00056669><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00690_00056669><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>It is the duty of sage to use his

lives.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56670.<voice 00760_00056670><start_lip_sync n0:

56671.<voice 00790_00056671><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00790_00056671><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>We have thus sustained the world from

56672.<voice 00880_00056672><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00880_00056672><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>It is the Crown of Wisdom.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56673.<voice 00970_00056673><start_lip_sync n0:
Thank you for your hard work this time. I am convinced that you are, after all, worthy of my trust, as I

56674.<voice 01000_00056674><start_lip_sync n0:
